title: paintball party
content:
I post it here 'cos this is not a Keen game, and not mine either. I've just found it on allegro.cc and the first screenshot I saw was [img]http://www.allegro.cc/depot/screenshots/2659_large.png[/img].
Keen's shirt is not pink here so some of you won't like it [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

And [url=http://www.allegro.cc/depot/project.php?_id=432&session=eac8288b4856ba74da38745a1ca1b188]here[/url] is the description of the game on allegro.cc. I haven't tried it yet as it's a multiplayer game, just found it interesting for having Keen as a character.

title: Re: paintball party
content: Interesting to see a new Keen reference! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I won't try the game, though, since I couldn't play multiplayer.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: paintball party
content:
Ha! Whaddya know? ol Keen finally gets a chance to compete with the big guns [as it were] By the time he's finnished, Duke will be vomiting so much paint he'll just have to sneeze to recolor his house!A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Pink?
content:
